title: Metal Detector
summaries: The Metal Detector is an informational accessory that detects valuable objects, including ores, chests, Life Crystals, and Life Fruit, within a rectangular area of 170Ã—125 tiles centered on the player. The Metal Detector has a 1/2 (50%) / 100% chance of being dropped by Nymphs, a rare cavern enemy.

The Metal Detector displays the specific type of what was detected, for instance, "Chlorophyte detected nearby!" When multiple valuables are detected, only the one with the highest value is noted. Like most informational accessories, it does not directly reveal the location or direction of the detected object.

The Metal Detector is one of the three parts necessary to make the <linked>Goblin Tech</linked>, with the others being the <linked>Stopwatch</linked> and the <linked>DPS Meter</linked>, and as such is a required ingredient in <linked>crafting</linked> the <linked>Shellphone</linked>.
